title: Track Contractor Submittal Status
description: A project manager wants to know the status of a critical submittal that was sent to engineering for review.

tasks.description: Find the submittal in the document control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the specific submittal record.

tasks.description: Check its current status and who the current reviewer is.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the status is 'Under Review' and it is currently assigned to the lead electrical engineer.

tasks.description: Send a reminder notification to the reviewer, as the review is almost due.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a reminder to the lead engineer.
